pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Wednesday, March 1, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Lower Mainland, British Columbia

12:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with nursing students. He will be joined by the Premier of British Columbia, David Eby, and Minister of Employment, Workforce Development and Disability Inclusion, Carla Qualtrough.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement with the Premier of British Columbia, David Eby. A joint media availability will follow. Minister of Employment, Workforce Development and Disability Inclusion, Carla Qualtrough, will also be in attendance.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12:00 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.

4:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall with trade workers and apprentices.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 3:30 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
